name: Russian Shrimp and Pineapple Salad
author: LadyDi
summary: A classic Russian layered salad with shrimp, canned pineapple, hard-boiled eggs, and Cheddar cheese. It is served with mayonnaise.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 (8 ounce) can pineapple, drained and finely chopped
¾ cup grated aged Cheddar cheese
directions: Bring a saucepan of water and salt to a boil, add shrimp, and cook until pink, 3 to 5 minutes
Spread out cooled shrimp on a serving platter and top with 1/2 the mayonnaise
Mix grated eggs and remaining mayonnaise in a bowl and spread on top of the shrimp
